languages.text: Что беды ее рождены нетвердостью веры, и да вернется тень на нить Паутины, чтобы исполнять волю Его. Он — есть Смерть.
That her woes stemmed from her wavering faith, and that the shadow must return to the thread of the Web in order to do His bidding. He is Death.
languages.original_text: Что беды ее рождены нетвердостью веры, и да вернется тень на нить Паутины, чтобы исполнять волю Его. Он — есть Смерть.

traits.locale_text: That her woes stemmed from her faith's unsteadfastness, and that the shadow must return to the way of Ahn'shini in order to do His bidding. Ayen Kaen Dho.
That her woes stemmed from her faith's unsteadfastness, and that the shadow must return to the way of Ahn'shini in order to do His bidding. Ayen Kaen Dho.
That her woes stemmed from her wavering faith, and that the shadow must return to the Way of Ahn'shini in order to do His bidding. Ayen Kaen Dho.

That her woes stemmed from her wavering faith, and that the shadow must return to the thread of the Web in order to do His bidding. He is Death.
That her woes stemmed from her wavering faith, and that the shadow must return to the thread of the Web in order to do His bidding. He is Death.

languages.text: Dass ihre Sorgen auf ihrem wankenden Glauben beruhten, und der Schatten zum Faden des Netzes zurückkehren musste, um seinen Willen umzusetzen. Er ist der Tod.
languages.original_text: That her woes stemmed from her wavering faith, and that the shadow must return to the thread of the Web in order to do His bidding. He is Death.

traits.locale_text: Dass ihre Sorgen auf ihrem wankenden Glauben beruhten, und der Schatten zum Faden des Netzes zurückkehren musste, um seinen Willen umzusetzen. Er ist der Tod.

languages.text: Que su pesar era fruto de la flaqueza de su fe, y que la sombra debía volver al hilo de la Red para hacer Su voluntad. Él es la muerte.
languages.original_text: That her woes stemmed from her wavering faith, and that the shadow must return to the thread of the Web in order to do His bidding. He is Death.

traits.locale_text: Que su pesar era fruto de la flaqueza de su fe, y que la sombra debía volver al hilo de la Red para hacer Su voluntad. Él es la muerte.

languages.text: 彼女の苦悩は揺らぐ信仰に起因する者であり、その影は主の命令に従うためにアーシニに道に戻らなければならない。彼は死だ。
languages.original_text: That her woes stemmed from her wavering faith, and that the shadow must return to the thread of the Web in order to do His bidding. He is Death.

traits.locale_text: 彼女の苦悩は揺らぐ信仰に起因する者であり、その影は主の命令に従うためにアーシニに道に戻らなければならない。彼は死だ。

languages.text: 她意识到，她的痛苦源于她动摇的信仰。影子必须重归织血罗网的教义，才能完成祂的旨意。祂便是死亡本身。
languages.original_text: That her woes stemmed from her wavering faith, and that the shadow must return to the thread of the Web in order to do His bidding. He is Death.

traits.locale_text: 她意识到，她的痛苦源于她动摇的信仰。影子必须重归织血罗网的教义，才能完成祂的旨意。祂便是死亡本身。

languages.text: Que ses malheurs avaient pour origine sa foi vacillante, et que l'ombre doit retourner au fil de la Toile pour accomplir Sa volonté. Il incarne la mort.
languages.original_text: That her woes stemmed from her wavering faith, and that the shadow must return to the thread of the Web in order to do His bidding. He is Death.

traits.locale_text: Que ses malheurs avaient pour origine sa foi vacillante, et que l'ombre doit retourner au fil de la Toile pour accomplir Sa volonté. Il incarne la mort.

languages.text: Gölgenin dertlerinin sarsılan inancından doğduğunu ve O'nun buyruklarını yerine getirmek için Ağ'ın ipliğine geri dönmesi gerektiğini söyledi. O Ölüm'dür.
languages.original_text: That her woes stemmed from her wavering faith, and that the shadow must return to the thread of the Web in order to do His bidding. He is Death.
